## Sections to Include
- [ ] Introduction and setup (markdown)
- [ ] Section 1: {topic}
- [ ] Section 2: {topic}
- [ ] Section 3: {topic}
- [ ] Summary and next steps

## Code Requirements
- [ ] All code cells runnable in sequence
- [ ] Clear markdown explanations
- [ ] Error handling demonstrated
- [ ] Output cells cleared before commit

## Datasets/Resources Needed
- Dataset 1: {location or source}
- API: {if applicable}

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Runs without errors in clean environment
- [ ] Estimated runtime: < 10 minutes
- [ ] All imports at top of notebook
- [ ] Requirements listed in first cell
